entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who led the way to Dean and Seamus. He had played Quidditch against Warrington.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is a student at Hogwarts who was discussing students entering with Harry and Seamus.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a student at Hogwarts who was discussing students entering with Dean and Harry.

entities.name: warrington
entities.description: Warrington is a big bloke from Slytherin who looks like a sloth. He put his name in for the Goblet of Fire.

entities.name: diggory
entities.description: Diggory is a Hufflepuff student who is being talked about by the Hufflepuffs. He has good looks and might have wanted to risk them.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who suddenly said 'Listen!' when people were cheering in the entrance hall.

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: Angelina Johnson is a tall black girl who plays Chaser on the Gryffindor Quidditch team. She put her name in for the Goblet of Fire.

entities.name: hufflepuffs
entities.description: Hufflepuffs are a group of students at Hogwarts who are talking about Diggory and putting their names in for the Goblet of Fire.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is a house at Hogwarts where Warrington is from. It is being mentioned as a reason why Harry doesn't want to have a Slytherin champion.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is a house at Hogwarts where Angelina Johnson plays Quidditch. It is being mentioned as the team she plays for.

relationships.description: Harry opposed Warrington's entry into the Goblet of Fire, saying 'We can't have a Slytherin champion!'
Harry was mentioned as someone who might be entering the Goblet of Fire, but it is actually Diggory who is being talked about by the Hufflepuffs.
Hermione interrupted the conversation when Angelina Johnson came into the hall and said 'Well, I've done it! Just put my name in!'
The Hufflepuffs were talking about Diggory and putting their names in for the Goblet of Fire.
Slytherin is associated with Warrington, who put his name in for the Goblet of Fire.
Gryffindor is associated with Angelina Johnson, who plays Chaser on the Gryffindor Quidditch team.
